\documentclass{beamer}
\usepackage{xcolor}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{calc}
\usepackage{pgf}
\usepackage{multirow}
% #########################
% #  GLOBAL STYLE         #
% #########################
\definecolor{textcolor}{rgb}{0, 100, 0}
\defbeamertemplate*{background canvas}{global}
    {%		    
      \definecolor{bgcolor}{rgb}{0, 0, 100}\color{bgcolor}\vrule width\paperwidth height\paperheight
}

\BeforeBeginEnvironment{frame}{%
\color{textcolor}
\setbeamertemplate{background canvas}[0, 0, 100]
}
% #########################


\setbeamercolor{animationname progress}{use=animationname,bg=animationname.fg}
				\defbeamertemplate{footline}{animationname}{
			     \pgfmathsetmacro{\val}{0.5}
				  \pgfmathsetmacro{\calcposition}{0.9-\val}
				  \dimen0=\calcposition\paperwidth
				  \multiply\dimen0 by \insertframenumber
				  \divide\dimen0 by \inserttotalframenumber
				  \edef\progressbarwidth{\the\dimen0}
				
				  \leavevmode%
				    \hspace{\val\paperwidth}\begin{beamercolorbox}[wd=\progressbarwidth,ht=1.75ex,dp=1ex]{animationname progress}
				    \end{beamercolorbox}%
				}
				\setbeamercolor{animationname}{fg=blue!50!black}




% #########################
% #  TEMPLATE TEMPLATENAME #
% #########################
\defbeamertemplate*{background canvas}{1684674077}
    {%		    
      \definecolor{bgcolor}{rgb}{100, 0, 100}\color{bgcolor}\vrule width\paperwidth height\paperheight
}      


    \makeatletter
    \define@key{beamerframe}{Templatename}[true]{%
\setbeamertemplate{background canvas}[1684674077]
\setbeamertemplate{footline}[animationname]
}

}
